title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2386/86 of 28 July 1986 amending quantitative limits fixed for imports of certain textile products originating in Czechoslovakia, Hungary, Poland and Romania
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2386/86
of 28 July 1986
amending quantitative limits fixed for imports of certain textile products originating in Czechoslovakia, Hungary, Poland and Romania
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The quantitative limits for textile products originating in Czechoslovakia, Hungary, Poland and Romania, as fixed in Annex III to Regulation (EEC) No 3589/82, are hereby amended for 1986 as laid down in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 July 1986.
For the Commission
Willy DE CLERCQ
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 374, 31. 12. 1982, p. 106.
(2) OJ No L 147, 31. 5. 1986, p. 1.
